entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 21. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
